message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering its value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is my bottom line.  I know this product is worth a lot to you, and I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment at this price.
Hello Alice, after careful consideration, I am unable to meet your asking price of $12,000 for the product. I am willing to offer $11,000. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
